item.title: me
item.description: Staff Product Developer 2019 to present responsible for handling ETL architected and developed configuration driven ETL for analytics product hands on experience with azure data factory, azure AKS (2+years) and azure analytics played key role in an endeavour for setting up datalake at organization tech stack : c-sharp, dotnet core, node, elastic-search, kubernetes | azure-aks, azure-web-app-service, azure-function Senior Software Developer 2015-2019 led efforts for building emailing solution using azures' serverless offerings responsible for multiple bulk data processing solutions using azure data factory led efforts for reimagining key solutions responsible for building and maintaining RESTful APIs hands on experience with SQL.
